Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Nail dystrophy 5% Autosomal recessive inheritance - Brittle hair - Dry hair - Hypotrichosis - Intellectual disability - Nail dysplasia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage of
